A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't care what anyone says\, this a great movie. The relationship between Rey and Kylo Ren is what really drove this movie for me. Also\, despite what people say I enjoyed Luke in this movie. The only people who truly hate this movie are the over obsessed Star Wars fanboys who want everything to stay the same and get the super obvious reveals like if Luke was Rey's father. Too bad.
